items.name: Oriath's End
explicitMods: 34% increased Charge Recovery
Enemies you Kill during Effect have a 26% chance to Explode, dealing a tenth of their maximum Life as Damage of a Random Element
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Ennui prevailed, until inspiration sparked
a mote of flame, kindled by fury
and all in his path were obliterated.

items.name: Crown of Eyes
enchantMods: Kinetic Blast has a 75% chance for an additional explosion
explicitMods: +336 to Accuracy Rating
149% increased Energy Shield
-30% to Fire Resistance
0.59% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
0.3% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Increases and Reductions to Spell Damage also apply to Attacks at 150% of their value
flavourText: Turning, gazing, blinking,
behold the eyes of void.
Burning, razing, drinking,
your mind is destroyed.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).
explicitMods: Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Base Burning Damage is 25% of Overkill Damage
40% more Burning Damage
Buff grants 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Buff grants 15% increased Fire Damage
Buff grants 13% more Spell Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff adding cold damage to spells and attacks. If you shatter an enemy, this skill will cause them to explode and deal AoE cold damage to enemies near them. This damage is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.
explicitMods: Deals 308 to 462 Cold Damage
Damage cannot be Reflected
Buff grants 38 to 56 Added Attack Cold Damage
Buff grants 38 to 56 Added Spell Cold Damage
Buff grants 15% increased Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which adds lightning damage to spells and attacks. The damage inflicted by this skill is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.

Cannot inflict Shock
Base duration is 6.00 seconds
Storm Hits an Enemy every 0.25 Seconds

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the accuracy of nearby allies, and physical damage taken by nearby enemies. Gain stages by killing enemies while carrying the banner. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.

Nearby Enemies take 11% increased Physical Damage
